DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date associated image (ex CT, MRI) exams are performed for the specific time point (visit) as indicated per study requirements.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Associated image (ex PET-CT, CT-MRI) exams performed for the specific time point (visit) as indicated per study requirements.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

Concepts.definition: A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

Property.preferredDefinition: The degree to which two or more quantities or events are linearly associated, a statistical relation between two or more variables such that systematic changes in the value of one variable are accompanied by systematic changes in the others.:Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.

Concepts.definition: The degree to which two or more quantities or events are linearly associated, a statistical relation between two or more variables such that systematic changes in the value of one variable are accompanied by systematic changes in the others.
Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/18/13 removed caBIG ACRIN PET CSI; Associated with ACRIN PET CSI. jc  10/14/10 released as part of draft CDE cleanup activity.  12/18/09 updated to expand scope to exams containing more than one image modality type.  1/3/08 created for ACRIN PET curation

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The place in time that any record of a medical imaging event whether physical or electronic  happens.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Time meaning: Like time, date, frequency, occurence,..etc

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Any record of a medical imaging event whether physical or electronic.:Event; something that happens at a given place and time.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Any record of a medical imaging event whether physical or electronic.
Something that happens at a given place and time.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 11/30/10 removed "Manually_curated" from definition.  7/16/08 - updated to include qualifers used in long name.  released for use in UofWash study.  3/16/07 - created to support the 10 character ACRIN date fields which include the '/'.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Provide date CT/MR correlative imaging performed:

DataElement.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElement.changeDescription: 11/18/13 removed caBIG ACRIN PET CSI; Associated with ACRIN PET CSI. jc  10/14/10 released as part of draft CDE cleanup activity.  1/17/08 - created for ACRIN PET data element.
